author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member has been asked by its elected officials to take action to nullify the NDAA (National Defense Authorization Act) of 2012 at the local level.  Please share how your organization is addressing this and any actions you've taken/implemented.
Thank you.
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Nullify the NDAA
